specifications.raw_text_preview:
Level Measurement Instrumentation Standards
Introduction
Level measurement is essential for tank inventory management, safety interlocking and process control in refineries. These standards draw on API 551 and industry specifications for differential pressure, ultrasonic, RF admittance, submersible and float‑actuated level instruments【51948133245220†L3300-L3359】.
Applicable Standards
API 551 – Level Measurement.
ISA 5.1 and ISA 20: symbols and data sheets.
IEC 61892 / IEC 60079: electrical equipment in explosive atmospheres (hazardous area certification).
ASTM D1248: plastic materials (for float materials).
Equipment Types
Differential pressure level transmitters: flanged sensing units with 4–20 mA output and ±0.25 % accuracy【51948133245220†L3300-L3316】.
Ultrasonic level instruments: non‑contact echo‑time devices for liquids; microprocessor‑based transmitters with temperature compensation and narrow beam angle【51948133245220†L3321-L3359】.
